utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come in. I've been waiting for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! I just wanna--Ahhh!!! Oh my God! Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I'm sorry! I'm sorry! I-I-I was um, I was taking a nap.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Since when do take naps in that position. Oh God Monica, tell me you were waiting for a guy! Please tell me you were waiting for a guy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes. Yes, I was. A guy. From work. I'm seeing a guy from work! Ha!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That cute waiter guy from your restaurant, the one that looks like a non-threatening Ray Liotta?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-huh, that one!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know what, just give me a second and I'll be out of your hair. I'm just gonna grab a jacket. When I get back, I want every little detail. Maybe that's him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, umm, okay, umm… It's just Joey and Ross.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why aren't you guys at the movie?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, we were! But Ross was talking so loud on his phone they threw us out!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I had to talk loud because the movie was loud!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He's talking to London!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But why?! Did he get in touch with Emily?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well no, not yet. He's calling everyone on her side of the family hoping that someone will help him get in touch with her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I-I-I don't care if I said some other girl's name you prissy, old twit!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross! Way to suck up to the family.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ha-ha-ha--enh-enh. I'm so glad you guys are all here! My office finally got wrinkle free fax paper!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no-no-no-no, vomit tux! No-no, vomit tux!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't worry, I had it dry-cleaned.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Vomit tux? Who vomited on—y'know what, what you up to Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I'm doing this telethon thing on TV and my agent got me a job as co-host!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that's great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A little uh, good deed for PBS and a little TV exposure, now that's the kind of math Joey likes to do!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ugh, PBS!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's wrong with PBS?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ugh, what's right with them?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why don’t you like PBS, Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, 'cause right after my mom killed herself, I was just in this really bad place, y'know personally. So, I just thought that it'd make me feel better if I wrote to Sesame Street, 'cause they were so nice when I was a little kid! No one ever wrote back.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well y'know a lot of those Muppets don't have thumbs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All I got was a lousy key chain! And by that time I was living in a box. I didn't have keys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm sorry Pheebs, I just, y'know, I just wanted to do a good deed. Like-like you did with the babies.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This isn't a good deed, you just wanted to get on TV! This is totally selfish.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What about you, having those babies for your brother? Talk about selfish!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What-what are you talking about?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, yeah, it was a really nice thing and all, but it made you feel really good right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. So?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It made you feel good, so that makes it selfish. Look, there's no unselfish good deeds, sorry.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes there are! There are totally good deeds that are selfless.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, may I ask for one example?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, it's… Y'know there's—no you may not!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's because all people are selfish.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you calling me selfish?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you calling you people? Yeah, well sorry to burst that bubble, Pheebs, but selfless good deeds don't exist. Okay? And you the deal on Santa Clause right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm gonna find a selfless good dead. I'm gonna beat you, you evil genius.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Hello, Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Emily? Emily! Oh my God! Oh my God, it's Emily! It's Emily everyone! Shush-shush-shhst! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ross, I'm only ringing to say stop harassing my relatives. Good-bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No wait! Look, wait! Okay, you can hang up, but I'm gonna keep calling! I'm gonna, I'm gonna call everyone in England if that's what it takes to get you to talk to me!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Really? About what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look you're my wife. We're-we're married. Y'know? I-I love you. I-I really miss you.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I miss you to. Well, at least I think I do.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She's talking.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, Joey, when you said the deal with Santa Clause, you meant?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That he doesn't exist.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So Chandler, have you heard about Monica's secret boyfriend?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh, yeah. She uh, she uh, she uh might've mentioned him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So Mon, when are we gonna meet this new secret waiter man?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, he's really shy. I-I don’t think he's up to meeting everyone yet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I don't think he's up to meeting everyone yet.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t care! I wanna meet this guy who's the best sex she ever had!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?! That's what you heard? You said that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I might've said that. Why is that funny?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because I'm very happy for him! And you, you lucky dog!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, Emily's willing to work on the relationship.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: In London!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She wants me to move to London.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But you live here! You know that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What-what-what are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I bet if I talk to Carol and Susan I can convince them to move to London with Ben.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm sure your ex-wife will be more than happy to move to another country so you can patch things up with your new wife.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It could happen.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How ya doin'? Welcome. Good to see ya!

utterance.speaker: Stage Director
utterance.content: This will be your phone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's great. But uh, I'm not really expecting a lot of calls.

utterance.speaker: Stage Director
utterance.content: No you answer it and take pledges.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But I'm the host!

utterance.speaker: Stage Director
utterance.content: No, Gary Collins is the host. You'll be answering the phones.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You don't seem to understand. See, I was Dr. Drake Remoray.

utterance.speaker: Stage Director
utterance.content: Well, here's your phone doctor.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I cannot believe I can't find a selfless good deed! Y'know that old guy that lives next to me? Well, I snuck over there and-and raked up all the leaves on his front stoop. But he caught me and force-fed me cider and cookies. Then I felt wonderful. That old jackass!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Maybe Joey's right. Maybe all good deeds are selfish.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I will find a selfless good deed! 'Cause I just gave birth to three children and I will not let them be raised in a world where Joey is right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, Monica? Can I ask you a cooking question?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If you're cooking on the stove, does that mean that your new secret boyfriend is better in bed than Richard?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler! Is he?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, y'know I-I-I think I'm gonna respect the privacy of my new secret boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?! I mean if this guy was me and it was me who had learned that it was me who was the best you'd ever had, I'd be going like this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right Emily, as much as I love you, I'm sorry, I can't move to London without Ben.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I understand that would be difficult.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, would you please consider moving here? I mean you were gonna move here anyway, why can't you just do that?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I don't know, it's just…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh-okay, but-but I know, that even though I've been a-a complete idiot up 'til now, I mean, I mean you-you-you have to come here. You have to come here so we can work this out.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, did you just say all right?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I did. Now I'm the idiot.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, Emily that is, that is so great. It's gonna be so great! We're gonna be like-like-like two idiots in love!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ross, there's one thing that really scares me still.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, tell me.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Well, you have to understand how humiliating it was for me up on that altar in front of my entire family, all my friends.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know. I am, I am so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: And then after decided to forgive you, seeing you at the airport catching our plane with her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Again, very sorry.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I mean, I can't-I can't be in the same room as her! It drives me mad just thinking of you being in the same room as her!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Emily, there is nothing between Rachel and me. Okay? I love you.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: All right. I'll come to New York and we'll try and make this work.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh that is so great! That's…

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: As long as you don't see Rachel anymore.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So I asked Emily if she would come to New York, and she said yes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh-ohh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No-no-no! Only if I promise never to see Rachel again.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! You can't—what did you tell her?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I told her I'd have to think about it. I mean, how the hell am I supposed to make this kind of a decision? I'm actually asking you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you can't just not see Rachel anymore, she's one of your best friends.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! But, he can't not exactly see Emily, I mean that's his wife.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's true!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but you've known Rachel since High School and you cannot just cut her out of your life.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's true!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, you cannot.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks for the help, problem solved.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Mon!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh hey Joey! We've been watching all day, when are you gonna be on TV?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See, there was kind of a mix up in my agent's office, but I'm still on TV and that's good exposure.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're not on TV.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, uh, okay, how, how about now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, there he is! There he is!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello New York!

utterance.speaker: Emeril
utterance.content: Now maybe you just like wanna but the whole duck in there! Who cares, y'know? Now I got the legs…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How many times have I told you guys, you never watch the cooking channel!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, listen, I need that broiling pan that Joey borrowed the other day.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that was yours? Uh, yeah, we used it when the duck was throwing up caterpillars.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: William Sonoma, fall catalog, Page 27.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Expect it in 4-6 weeks. Umm, hey, umm, Joey's gonna be at the telethon for the rest of the day, we have the whole place to ourselves.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, so?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well I just, thought maybe you'd wanna book some time with the best you'd ever had.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know what, champ? I think I'll pass.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's your point?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: PBS telethon.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! What good is that gonna do anybody?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it helps the bee look tough in front of his bee friends. The bee is happy and I am definitely not.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now, y'know the bee probably died after he stung ya.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Aw, dammit!

utterance.speaker: Stage Director
utterance.content: Back on in 30 seconds people!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, excuse me, would you mind switching with me?

utterance.speaker: PBS Volunteer
utterance.content: Hey, no way, I'm in the shot man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on man! You've been here all day!

utterance.speaker: PBS Volunteer
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I'm taking pledges here, eh?

utterance.speaker: Stage Director
utterance.content: We're on in 3, 2,

utterance.speaker: Gary Collins
utterance.content: Welcome back to our fall telethon. Now if you've been enjoying the performance of Cirque Du Soleil, and you'd like to see more of the same kind of programming, it's very simple. All you have to do is call in your pledge and at that time tell the operator, one of our volunteers, what kind of programming you'd like to…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, that's it. I cannot make this decision! It is too difficult, so I'm just gonna leave it entirely to the gods of fate.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A Magic Eight ball?! You can't be serious, you can't make this decision with a toy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, it's not a toy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I don't know what else to do. I mean, I either keep my wife and lose one of my-my-my best friends or I keep my friend and get divorced the second time before I'm 30! So-so if anyone has-has a better suggestion, let's hear it! 'Cause I-I got nothing! All right, don't be shy, any suggestion will do. Okay then. Here we go. Magic 8 Ball, should I never see Rachel again? Ask again later. Later is not good enough. Ask again later. What the hell! This is broken! It-it is broken!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, let me see. Will Chandler have sex tonight? Don't count on it. Seems like it works to me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: PBS Telethon.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I would like to make a pledge. I would like to donate $200.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: $200? Are you sure Pheebs? I mean, after what Sesame Street did to ya?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'm still mad at them but I also now that they bring happiness to lots of kids who's moms didn't kill themselves, so by supporting them, I'm doing a good thing, but I'm not happy about it. So there, a selfless good deed.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And you don't a little good about donating the money?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, it sucks. I was saving up to buy a hamster.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A hamster? What, those things are like 10 bucks.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, not the one I had my eye on.

utterance.speaker: Gary Collins
utterance.content: It looks like we have surpassed last year's pledge total! Thank you viewers! The pledge that did it was taken by one of our volunteers… Oh boy! And may I say one of our sharpest dressed volunteers, Mr. Joseph Tribbiani!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look-look, Joey's on TV! Isn't that great? My pledge got Joey on TV! Oh that makes me feel—Oh no!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, maybe I got carried away before. But there's something you gotta know. If I'm the best, it's only because you've made me the best.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Keep talking.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I mean I was nothing before you. Call the other girls and ask. Which wouldn't take long. But when I'm with you, and we're together, OH…MY…GOD.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh-aw my God! Now, I understand if you never want to sleep with me again, but that would be wrong. We're too good! We owe it, to sex!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if we owe it? Oh my… When is Joey gonna be home?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I was kinda hoping we could do this without him. Oh no-no-no, leave the gloves on.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But, I just cleaned the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, why don't we lose the gloves.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, let's show them how it's done.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know that wasn't part of it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Are you ready? We're gonna be late!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: For what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: For Stella! Remember? She's gettin' her grove back in like 20 minutes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I uh, totally forgot about that. You mind if I take a rain check? I'm waiting for a call from Emily.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure. I guess. Hey, I hear you don't have to go to London. Yay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's not that easy, there's still a lot of relationship stuff.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Like what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just stuff. Y'know kinda what Emily wants.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, why don't you talk to me about it, maybe I can help.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. No. You-you can't help. I mean, I kinda have to do this without your help.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I-I know you can do that too. I'm just, I'm just saying if you need somebody to talk to… Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross? Look, whatever this relationship stuff that Emily wants, just give it to her. Come on, the bottom line here is that you love her. So just fix whatever she wants fixed. Just do it. I mean, you're gonna have to try. You'll just gonna hate yourself if you don't. Oh come on answer it! It's driving me crazy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello. Hi sweetie. Good. Look umm, yes I've been thinking about that thing that you wanted me to do and, I can do it. So will you come to New York?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Never done that before.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nope.
